page.title: 10EVENTS
page.content: The DEVYNNOCK AND DISTRICT AGRIC- ULTURAL SOCIETY(note the old Anglic- ised spelling of Defynnog) exists to hold a show at the beginning of Sept- ember each year. This represents the major social event of the year; it attracts entries and spectators from a large part of south and mid-Wales. It is held in Dickson's Field, on the flat flood plain of the river, just opposite the Army camp. There are the usual range of classes for different kinds of stock;cattle, sheep and horses together with riding events and a famous rodeo. This is an occasion for the young or foolhardy to attempt to ride unbroken ponies which have been brought down from the mount- ains especially for this purpose.
